name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The U.S. House of Representatives ended its "China Week" on Monday with the passage of a series of bills aimed at addressing various threats from the Chinese Communist Party. These bills cover a variety of areas, including biosecurity, drones, agriculture, and battery dependence. Many companies are involved, including BGI, WuXi Biologics, WuXi AppTec, DJI, Guoxuan High-tech, BYD, Envision Technology, CATL, EVE Energy, and Haichen Energy Storage.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a game anchor covered the game interface with a picture before entering the game in order to prevent sensitive IDs from appearing in the live broadcast.
